extension.name: JE Camera Slideshow
extension.author: jExtensions.com
extension.description:
JE Camera Slideshow

Download more free extensions from jExtensions.com
Need help? Click here to visit the support page.
Credits: Camera

field.name: jQuery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: Enable or Disable the latest jQuery version. Make sure that jQuery is loaded only once on your website.

field.name: imgHeight
field.label: Slideshow Height (pixles)
field.description: Height of slideshow in pixels.

field.name: alignment
field.label: Image Alignment
field.description: Choose the images alignment in the slideshow.

field.name: autoPlay
field.label: Auto Play
field.description: Edable or disable the autoplya function.

field.name: cameraSkin
field.label: Skin Color
field.description: Color of arrows and pause button.

field.name: fx
field.label: Transaction Effect
field.description: Choose the slider transaction effect.

field.name: slideOn
field.label: Effect Apply
field.description: Decide if the transition effect will be applied to the current (prev) or the next slide.

field.name: time
field.label: Sliding Time (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the next one.

field.name: transPeriod
field.label: Sliding Effect Time (ms)
field.description: Lenght of the sliding effect in milliseconds.

field.name: pagination
field.label: Pagination
field.description: Display pagination bullets or thumbnails.

field.name: navigation
field.label: Navigation Buttons
field.description: Display or not the navigation buttons.

field.name: navigationHover
field.label: Show Navigation Buttons
field.description: If navigation buttons Enabled, choose when to show them.

field.name: playPause
field.label: Play / Pause Button
field.description: Display or not the Play / Pause button.

field.name: pauseOnClick
field.label: Pause on Click
field.description: Pause slideshow on click.

field.name: hover
field.label: Pause on Hover
field.description: Pause slider on mouse hover.

field.name: thumbWidth
field.label: Thumb Width (pixles)
field.description: Width of images are in pixels.

field.name: thumbHeight
field.label: Thumb Height (pixles)
field.description: Height of images are in pixels.

field.name: thumbQuality
field.label: Thumb Quality
field.description: Quality of the croped thumbnail image.

field.name: thumbAlign
field.label: Thumb Alignment
field.description: Choose the cropped image alignment.

field.name: Image1
field.label: Slide Image
field.description: Choose an image.

field.name: Video1
field.label: Slide Video
field.description: Embade a Youtube or Vimeo video.

field.name: Link1
field.label: Slide Link
field.description: URL where the slider image will link.

field.name: Text1
field.label: Slide Text
field.description: Add image caption here. HTML allowed.
